channel.title: Soundcard
channel.description: So I was moving a bunch of wired around and The wires touched my amp's power wire, (the wire i plug in the back of my pc) Now whenever I plug my amp and sub into my soundcard the speakers speed up with my cpu fan if i stop the fan it goes away but is still static. How can I fix this?

item.title: Soundcard
item.dc:creator: @RUNE-PK RUNE-PK
item.description:
@RUNE-PK wrote:

Spades:

Buy a new sound card, they are cheap. Sounds like you shorted it out(From what I could understand from your post).

Sorry i was up for 2 days trying to fix it, Anyways what I meant was I have a car amplifier in my room with a 12v converter box. So I use my pc to listen to music and watch t.v. I spliced the wires from my old headphones to an RCA plug and The open wire hit my Positive wire on Converter Box then everything just stopped… So Imma buy a new one Thank you guys [quote=“Justin Bieber, post:2, topic:551999”]OP are u high?[/quote]

Shut up… Lol

Read full topic
